#summary Use case: 001 Install

=== Purpose ===
Install SMD Application

  * Actors
    * System Administrator

=== Preconditions ===
  * N/A

=== Main flow ===
  # User approves license
  # User approves default installation path or change to a custom path
  # System verifies available disc space
  # SMD is installed

=== Alternate/Exception flows ===
  * Out of disc space
    # Error message is show to the user that more disc space is required

=== Postconditions ===
  * SMD Application is installed
